book_overview.premise: In a world where AI coding buddies are the hottest trend of 2025, 10-year-old Mia Chen from Seattle battles her dyslexia to decode multisyllabic words, discovering that her passion for programming holds the key to reading success—when her glitchy AI turns reading mishaps into app magic, Mia not only masters syllable division but inspires her friends to code their way through literacy challenges in this tech-infused adventure.

name_age_background.name: Mia Chen
name_age_background.background: Chinese-American girl from a multigenerational family in suburban Seattle, with parents who are tech engineers
name_age_background.struggle: Dyslexia causing difficulties in decoding multisyllabic words

personality_traits: Creative and passionate about their interest
Resilient when pursuing what they love
Kind-hearted but sometimes defensive about difficulties
protagonist_profile.specific_struggle: Decoding multisyllabic words through syllable division
protagonist_profile.passion: AI coding companions that help kids build personalized apps
protagonist_profile.growth_arc: Mia struggles with reading long words in school assignments, gets frustrated when her dyslexia hinders her coding hobby, has a breakthrough by applying syllable division to both code and text, masters the skill to read fluently, and teaches her coding club friends the technique

mentor_guide.personality: Patient, encouraging, sees potential in protagonist
mentor_guide.function: Provides explicit instruction and connects passion to skill

peer_group.description: 3-4 diverse classmates with varying learning profiles
peer_group.function: Normalize struggles, provide collaboration opportunities, show different paths

parallel_adult.starting_belief: Worried about protagonist's struggles, potentially fixed mindset

secondary_setting.secondary: Virtual coding lab inside her AI's holographic world

setting_description.sensory_details: Vivid descriptions of creative spaces, technology, peer interactions
setting_description.memorable_elements: The AI companion starts 'glitching' by incorporating Mia's misread words into funny app features, leading to viral inventions

contemporary_hook_integration.hook: AI coding companions that help kids build personalized apps
contemporary_hook_integration.story_function: Mia's passion for coding her AI companion involves breaking down complex code words into syllables, mirroring how she learns to divide and decode long words in reading
contemporary_hook_integration.why_kids_care: Connects to current interests and aspirations of 9-10 year olds in 2025
contemporary_hook_integration.authenticity: Protagonist's genuine passion, not a gimmick

educational_integration_plan.creative_activity_connection: Mia's passion for coding her AI companion involves breaking down complex code words into syllables, mirroring how she learns to divide and decode long words in reading
